title: Are you an Animal Lover? | Jungle + Farm Animal Song Compilation | Pinkfong Kids Songs

subtasks: Immerse in the farm environment, interact with various animals
Feed animals with appropriate food (e.g., corn, hay, wheat, nuts)
Milk a cow gently and correctly
Scratch a pig's back side to side
Count farm animals and perform basic counting
Groom a horse by combing its mane up and down

tasks.task: Dealing with farm animals and their sounds
subtasks: Recognize animal sounds and match them to the correct animals

tasks.task: Solving puzzles and riddles related to farm environment
subtasks: Identify hidden animal names or sounds in scrambled text
Stack objects or follow through with dance movements (e.g., bus wheels, animal dances)
React to scary jungle animals and find safety
Splash and swim in a lake or river
Ride on a raft, steer/propel with paddling motions

tasks.task: Solving problems related to stuck or immobilized objects
subtasks: Identify and assist in moving a stuck boat, potentially fixing or inflating it

tasks.task: Detecting and handling messes or damage (e.g., finding a soiled sleeping bag)
subtasks: Collaborate with group members to identify the cause of contamination
Respond to clues leading to hidden objects or sounds
Complete memory recall or selection tasks to progress in the environment
